name: Inferno Metal Festival 2026
description:
**Rockefeller:**
16:30 1914
18:00 Svarttjern
19:30 Incantation
21:15 Tormentor
23:30 Cult of Luna

**John Dee:**
17:15 Forsman
18:45 Myr
20:30 Hulder
22:30 Carnivore A.D.

Inferno has become a true black Easter tradition for metal fans, bands and music industry from all over the world every year since the start back in 2001.

The festival offers exclusive concerts in unique surroundings with some of the best extreme metal bands and experimental artists in the world, from the new and underground to the legendary giants.

At Inferno you meet up with fellow metal heads for four days of head banging, party, expos, horror films, art exhibitions and all the unholy treats your dark heart desires.

[www.infernofestival.net](https://www.infernofestival.net)

--

Festivalpass: kr. 4.240,- + bill.avg.

Dagspass: kr. 1.125,- + bill.avg.

18 års aldersgrense med legitimasjonsplikt. 

Dørene åpner kl. 16.00.
